dependencies.description:
ecCodes is a package developed by ECMWF for processing meteorological
data in GRIB (1/2), BUFR (3/4) and GTS header formats.
dependencies.name: eccodes

dependencies.description:
Magics is the latest generation of the ECMWF's Meteorological plotting
software MAGICS. Although completely redesigned in C++, it is intended
to be as backwards-compatible as possible with the Fortran interface.
dependencies.name: magics

dependencies.description: A package to search for shared libraries on various platforms.
dependencies.name: py-findlibs

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip

description:
A Python package that wraps some of ECMWF libraries to be used by Python
interfaces to ECMWF software.
name: py-ecmwflibs

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
